caption.p: Summary of patient trajectories from onset to admission. Time flows from left to right. Onset (S) are slow progressors, Onset (Q) are quick progressors. The width of the branches is proportional to the percentage of patients. Branches end at the average length of stay in each ward. Left side: All patients, right side, top to bottom, age groups: 18–65 years old, 65–80 years old, >80 years old.
